name: SWERVE Fitness
description: Swerve is the first boutique fitness studio to livestream its experience into gyms and studios around the world. Swerve is also the first concept to feature location vs. location competition.
one_liner: Swerve is the first boutique fitness studio to livestream its experience into gyms and studios around the world. Swerve is also the first concept to feature location vs. location competition.
location: New York City, New York, United States
